'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a [ship supply](/theDefiantManagement/) in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* Each cannon shot adds 1 [x20px](/fileIconShipAmmunitionPng/) Ammunition to your ship (it does not appear as an item in your stash).
